name: Road To Trench
description:
Road To Trench is a 2D Platformer Adventure game that is inspired by the band twenty one pilots.

Tyler wakes up on the side of the road and can't remember how he got there. This road seems forgotten in the eyes of Tyler. There is a haunted and hollow feeling that comes with this road. He can't explain it, but he knows that he must walk this path. 

Help Tyler remember why he started creating music.  Help Josh face his demons. Help them remember all they have endured in the past that led them this this road. 

Help them walk the Road To Trench.

CREDITS:

Designed/Developed By: Levitate Wind Games (Brandon Fonticoba)

Software Used: Audacity, Aseprite, Pixelator, Unity

SoundFX: Freesound.org, Noiseforfun.com

Music: Zapsplat.com, Twinmusicom.org
